text: Nicola Shearn (born 14 October 1966) is a former synchronized swimmer from Great Britain. She competed in both the women's solo and women's duet competitions at the . == References == Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:British synchronised swimmers Category:Olympic synchronised swimmers of Great Britain Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 1986 World Aquatics Championships Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in synchronised swimming Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England
title: Nicola Shearn
